featured.text: By defining and illustrating a concept.
In 1871, he was appointed to illustrate The Wonders of Yellowstone, a story by Nathaniel P. Langford, who had participated in an expedition to Yellowstone.

definition.zh_def: 說明或展示某事物的方式，通常通過圖畫或示例。
definition.en_def: To explain or make something clear by using pictures, diagrams, or examples.
definition.example: The teacher used a diagram to illustrate the concept of photosynthesis.
